idea-plugin.name: TYPO3 XLIFF Utility
idea-plugin.description: Eases the creation/updating of XLIFF translations. Select target text and invoke the "Create/Update XLIFF translation" action. Define your Unit ID and destination file. The given text is automatically replaced by the fluid translate view helper.
